item.title: Compressed Sensing with the Fourier Ensemble
item.description: I’m reading the topic of compressed sensing and I find it extremely dense with a lot of historical perspective. This video is a great start to the topic. Reproducing the example The example at 14:05 in the video uses a DCT. The cosamp function used below is from this repository. The code here is slightly modified from the jupyter notebook available here. stx = 0 end = 1 n = 4096 Fs = int( n/(end - stx)) from math import pi from numpy.
